name: Fast Police Bike:Hero Simulato
description:
Welcome to the most exiting Fast Police Bike:Hero Simulator Driver, lover of bike riders must play this game to enjoy the riding of all types of bikes. Start the bike, take it out from garage and hit the streets of Open city where money is placed in order to buy new and modern types of bikes.
Race you fast speed Police bike in the speeding lane of road and hit the throttle until road is finished, your Police bike is beast and city is yours to run and rule on the roads
Features:
- Top class racing game with brand new Police Bikes
- Very easy and intuitive Bike controls
- Many Beautiful environments and tracks to choose from
- Super speed fast Police Motobikes
- Interesting animations and gameplay
